title.rendered: How Much Can You Get For Scrapping A Truck?

content.rendered:
Light duty or passenger trucks are increasingly popular as a primary vehicle for people all around the country. They are also used for work vehicles, and parts and components of these trucks are always in demand from scrap yards. These are typically larger vehicles, and they are not easy to store in garages, driveways, and backyards. This makes selling old, salvage trucks and junk cars in Chicago a simple way to make some cash and get the vehicles off of your property.

Getting the Best Price

All old trucks and junk cars in Chicago are priced according to their make, model, year, and overall condition. Vehicles that offer the most options for salvaging usable, quality parts are the highest priced.

If you are interested in getting the best possible price for trucks or junk cars in Chicago, consider the following:

  • Call the scrap yard early. Vehicles that are left to rust and deteriorate are worth much less.
  • Make sure you have the title in-hand as this is required for the sale to the junkyard.
  • Check to verify the junkyard tows the vehicle off of your property without any charge to the seller.

Call Aero Auto Parts

Before selling an old junk truck to any other junkyard, be sure to call our team at 773-645-9586.
We have over 50 years in the junk vehicle business, and we always treat our customers fairly through the process, ensuring you get a fair value for your old cars and trucks.
